summary: This is a preservation request email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to Microsoft, dated December 12, 2018, regarding the Epstein case. It includes an attached letter requesting preservation of data.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sends a preservation request to Microsoft regarding the Epstein case from the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Preservation Request to Microsoft
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York sends a preservation request to Microsoft, likely related to the Epstein investigation.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Office of the Assistant United States Attorney sending the preservation request.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Address of the Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office.

keyFacts: A preservation request was sent to Microsoft by the Southern District of New York on December 12, 2018, regarding the Epstein case.
The request indicates ongoing investigation activities by federal prosecutors into Epstein-related matters.
The correspondence shows coordination between law enforcement and technology companies for evidence preservation.
